entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a student who has helped his friend out of sticky spots. He is described as a good boy but lacks his father's talent.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who wants to stamp on Ron's foot when he looks amazed at Neville's situation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as Harry's friend who looks amazed at Neville's situation.

entities.name: mrs. longbottom
entities.description: Mrs. Longbottom is mentioned as Neville's mother who is sternly appraising and has a rather bony nose.

entities.name: neville's father
entities.description: Neville's father is mentioned as someone with talent that Neville lacks.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends who are together in the situation.
Neville is Mrs. Longbottom's child, as she asks him about his parents.
Neville is the child of Neville's father, who has talent that Neville lacks.
